title: "Nami, I feel all left out."

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} "Oh thank god taric's here"

{{champion:44}} "hello ladies and dragon"

{{champion:136}} "OH DAMN YOUR LOOKING GOOD WITH THAT REWORK TARIC, NOT AS GOOD AS ME THOUGH IM A FUKING SPACE DRAGON"

{{champion:44}} *ignoring sapce dragon* "what's happened to diana?"

{{champion:267}} "she-

{{champion:136}} "COULDN'T HANDLE HOW AWESOME AND AMAZING I WAS"

{{champion:44}} "new champions give me such a headache..."

{{champion:267}} "tell me about it. they think they're the fuking shit until realize how bad they are and stop playing them, isn't that right aurelion?" >:)

{{champion:136}} "OH PLEEAAAASE PEOPLE JUST DON'T KNOW HOW TO PLAY ME, I'M A SPACE DRAGON, PEOPLE WILL EVENTUALLY REALIZE MY KIT IS-"

{{champion:44}} "useless and annoying to use?"

{{champion:267}} "especially with that goddamn passive that makes csing so horrible"

{{champion:44}} "and a useless q that people with any mind can just dodge out of"

{{champion:267}} "a w that people can literally just walk towards you and your fuked" 

{{champion:44}} "that shitty e where you gain movement speed but lose it by TURNING?"

{{champion:267}} "and don't get me started on the active effect that's literally only good for getting to lane"

{{champion:136}} "well my ultima-"

{{champion:267}} "is the only thing thats good about you" :)

{{champion:44}} :)

{{champion:136}} :|

{{champion:136}} FUS RO DAH

{{champion:136}} DOUBLE KILL {{champion:267}}{{champion:44}}

{{champion:136}} **"SO WHAT IS MY ONE REMAINING LADY GOING TO DO?"**

{{champion:267}} "Help the other one."

{{champion:136}} **"I DON'T THINK A DUMP OF WATER ON HER HEAD WILL FIX THOSE CLOGGED LUNGS AND BESIIIIIIIIDES YOU'LL JUST PUT HER OUT! SHE WAS ABSOLUTELY  _ON FIRE _   RECENTLY. SHAME ON YOU."**

{{champion:267}} "Ah yes, I get the joke. Dragons breathe fire, well done."

{{champion:136}} **"OH ONLY THOSE SAD ONES. LIKE WHAT'S HER FACE? I'VE FORGOTTEN HER NAME ALREADY!"**

{{champion:267}} "It's-"

{{champion:136}} **"SHE RAN OFF IN TEARS, ACTUALLY USED HER LEGS! SAID SOMETHING ABOUT JOINING SOME SPACE CLUB AND GETTING SOME MORE SPACE.  "**

{{champion:267}} "I highly doubt that she would be the sort of person to go socialising, let alone join a club."

{{champion:136}} **"YOU FORGOT THE WORD SPACE. SSSSSPACE. SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSPACE. SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-"**

{{champion:267}} "WHAT???"

{{champion:136}} **"OH DONT WORRY I WAS JUST ENJOYING MY OWN AWESOMENESS."**

{{champion:267}} [aside] _"What the fuck have I gotten myself into?"_
